00033 #define FIRST_DAY   2361222  // Julian day for 1752/09/14
00034 #define FIRST_YEAR  1752     // wrong for many countries
00035 
00036 class U_EXPORT UDate {
00037 public:
00038 
00039         // Check for memory error
00040         U_MEMORY_TEST
00041 
00042         // Allocator e Deallocator
00043         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00044         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00045 
00046         // COSTRUTTORI
00047 
00048         UDate()
00049                 {
00050                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UDate, "", 0)
00051 
00052                 julian = _day = _month = _year = 0;
00053                 }
00054 
00055         void fromTime(time_t tm);
00056 
00057         UDate(time_t tm)
00058                 {
00059                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UDate, "%#4D", tm)
00060 
00061                 fromTime(tm);
00062                 }
00063 
00064         UDate(const char* str, bool UTC = false); // UTC is flag for date and time in Coordinated Universal Time: format YYMMDDMMSSZ
00065 
00066         void setYear(int year);
00067 
00068         void set(int day, int month, int year)
00069                 {
00070                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::set(%d,%d,%d)", day, month, year)
00071 
00072                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_RANGE(1,   day, 31)
00073                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_RANGE(1, month, 12)
00074 
00075                 julian = 0;
00076                 _day   = day;
00077                 _month = month;
00078 
00079                 setYear(year);
00080                 }
00081 
00082         UDate(int day, int month, int year)
00083                 {
00084                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UDate, "%d,%d,%d", day, month, year)
00085 
00086                 set(day, month, year);
00087                 }
00088 
00089         // Construct a UDate with a given day of the year and a given year.
00090         // The base date for this computation is 31 Dec. of the previous year.
00091         // i.e., UDate(-1,1901) = 31 Dec. 1900 and UDate(1,1901) = 2 Jan. 1901
00092 
00093         UDate(int day, int year)
00094                 {
00095                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UDate, "%d,%d", day, year)
00096 
00097                 julian = toJulian(1,1,year) - 1 + day;
00098 
00099                 fromJulian(julian);
00100                 }
00101 
00102         ~UDate()
00103                 {
00104                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UDate)
00105                 }
00106 
00107         // ASSEGNAZIONI
00108 
00109         void set(const UDate& d)
00110                 {
00111                 _day   = d._day;
00112                 _month = d._month;
00113                 _year  = d._year;
00114                 julian = d.julian;
00115                 }
00116 
00117         UDate(const UDate& d)
00118                 {
00119                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UDate, "%O", U_OBJECT_TO_TRACE(d))
00120 
00121                 U_MEMORY_TEST_COPY(d)
00122 
00123                 set(d);
00124                 }
00125 
00126         UDate& operator=(const UDate& d)
00127                 {
00128                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::operator=(%O)", U_OBJECT_TO_TRACE(d))
00129 
00130                 U_MEMORY_TEST_COPY(d)
00131 
00132                 set(d);
00133 
00134                 return *this;
00135                 }

00139         bool isValid() const;
00140 
00141         int getJulian();
00142 
00143         int getDay() const   { return _day; }
00144         int getYear() const  { return _year; }
00145         int getMonth() const { return _month; }
00146 
00147         // The daysTo() function returns the number of days between two date
00148 
00149         int daysTo(UDate& date)
00150                 {
00151                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::daysTo(%p)", &date)
00152 
00153                 U_RETURN(date.getJulian() - getJulian());
00154                 }
00155 
00156         void addDays(int days)
00157                 {
00158                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::addDays(%d)", days)
00159 
00160                 julian = getJulian() + days;
00161 
00162                 fromJulian(julian);
00163                 }
00164 
00165         void addMonths(int months);
00166 
00167         static int getMonth(const char* buf);
00168 
00169         void addYears(int years)
00170                 {
00171                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::addYears(%d)", years)
00172 
00173                 _year += years;
00174 
00175                 julian = toJulian(_day, _month, _year);
00176                 }
00177 
00178         int getDayOfWeek()
00179                 {
00180                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::getDayOfWeek()")
00181 
00182                 // (julian + 1) % 7 gives the value 0 for Sunday ... 6 for Saturday
00183 
00184                 U_RETURN((getJulian() + 1) % 7);
00185                 }
00186 
00187         // Returns the number of days in the month (28..31) for this date
00188 
00189         int getDaysInMonth() const;
00190 
00191         // Returns the day of the year [1,366] for this date
00192 
00193         int getDayOfYear()
00194                 {
00195                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::getDayOfYear()")
00196 
00197                 int y = _year - 1901;
00198 
00199                 U_RETURN(getJulian() - (y * 365) - (y / 4) - 2415385); // 2415385 -> 31/12/1900
00200                 }
00201 
00202         // Returns true if the specified year is a leap year; otherwise returns false
00203 
00204         static bool leapYear(int y);

00208                          UString strftime(const char* fmt);
00209         static UString strftime(const char* fmt, time_t);
00210 
00211         static time_t getSecondFromJulian(int julian)
00212                 {
00213                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::getSecondFromJulian(%d)")
00214 
00215                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(julian >= 2440588) // 2440588 -> 01/01/1970
00216 
00217                 time_t t = U_ONE_DAY_IN_SECOND * (julian - 2440588);
00218 
00219                 U_RETURN(t);
00220                 }
00221 
00222         time_t getSecond()
00223                 {
00224                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::getSecond()")
00225 
00226                 time_t t = getSecondFromJulian(getJulian());
00227 
00228                 U_RETURN(t);
00229                 }
00230 
00231         static time_t getSecondFromTime(const char* str) // seconds from string in HH:MM:SS format
00232                 {
00233                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::getSecondFromTime(%.*S)", 8, str)
00234 
00235                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(str[2], ':')
00236                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(str[5], ':')
00237 
00238                 // NB: sscanf() is VERY HEAVY...!!!
00239 
00240                 time_t t = (60 * 60 * atoi(str)) + (60 * atoi(str+3)) + atoi(str+6);
00241 
00242                 U_RETURN(t);
00243                 }
00244 
00245         static time_t getSecondFromTime(const char* str, bool gmt, const char* fmt = "%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S GMT");
00246 
00247         void setCurrentDate()
00248                 {
00249                 U_TRACE(1, "UDate::setCurrentDate()")
00250 
00251                 // UNIX system time - SecsSince1Jan1970UTC
00252 
00253                 (void) U_SYSCALL(gettimeofday, "%p,%p", &u_now, 0);
00254 
00255                 fromTime(u_now.tv_sec);
00256                 }
00257 
00258         static void setCurrentDate(UDate& date)
00259                 {
00260                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::setCurrentDate(%p)", &date)
00261 
00262                 date.setCurrentDate();
00263                 }

00274         UDate& operator+=(UDate& d)
00275                 {
00276                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::operator+=(%p)", &d)
00277 
00278                 julian = getJulian() + d.getJulian();
00279 
00280                 fromJulian(julian);
00281 
00282                 return *this;
00283                 }
00284 
00285         UDate& operator-=(UDate& d)
00286                 {
00287                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::operator-=(%p)", &d)
00288 
00289                 julian = getJulian() - d.getJulian();
00290 
00291                 fromJulian(julian);
00292 
00293                 return *this;
00294                 }

00296         friend UDate operator+(const UDate& d1, UDate& d2)
00297                 {
00298                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::operator+(%p,%p)", &d1, &d2)
00299 
00300                 return UDate(d1) += d2;
00301                 }
00302 
00303         friend UDate operator-(const UDate& d1, UDate& d2)
00304                 {
00305                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::operator+(%p,%p)", &d1, &d2)
00306 
00307                 return UDate(d1) -= d2;
00308                 }

00310         UDate& operator+=(int days)
00311                 {
00312                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::operator+=(%d)", days)
00313 
00314                 addDays(days);
00315 
00316                 return *this;
00317                 }
00318 
00319         UDate& operator-=(int days)
00320                 {
00321                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::operator-=(%d)", days)
00322 
00323                 addDays(-days);
00324 
00325                 return *this;
00326                 }
00327 
00328         friend UDate operator+(UDate& d, int days)
00329                 {
00330                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::operator+(%p,%d)", &d, days)
00331 
00332                 return UDate(d) += days;
00333                 }
00334 
00335         friend UDate operator-(UDate& d, int days)
00336                 {
00337                 U_TRACE(0, "UDate::operator-(%p,%d)", &d, days)
00338 
00339                 return UDate(d) -= days;
00340                 }
